original_title: 金曜の夜…部署内の歓迎会で酔いつぶれルームシェアする先輩女子社員2人に介抱という名目でお持ち帰りされた僕　佐知子　奏音かのん
overview: On Friday night, I got drunk at a welcome party in the department and was taken home by a senior female employee of the company who shared a room with them. At the company, when two seniors who were serious and kind and could work and were reliable came home, it was so lascivious. On Saturdays and Sundays, I was trapped in the room by two senior girls who shared the room and had sex.
title: It's Friday Night... We Had A Department Party And In The End, I Wound Up Sharing A Room With My 2 Lady Bosses, Who Took Me Home Saying That They Would Take Care Of Me.Sachiko Kanon Kanade
